B

back() - Static method in class me.kinomoto.proteam.history.History
 
Beam - Class in me.kinomoto.proteam.elements
Beam class is implementing the Beam of light creating methods as well as simulating its light path through different physical objects.
Beam(Segment, double, double) - Constructor for class me.kinomoto.proteam.elements.Beam
The constructor attributing segment coordinates, wavelength and brightness to the beam.
BeamSource - Class in me.kinomoto.proteam.elements
BeamSource class is implementing the BeamSource of light creating, saving, painting, moving, rotating and changing parameters methods.
BeamSource(DataInputStream) - Constructor for class me.kinomoto.proteam.elements.BeamSource
The constructor that is creating the BeamSource from the input file
BeamSource(Segment, double) - Constructor for class me.kinomoto.proteam.elements.BeamSource
The constructor that is creating the BeamSource with given parameters and along the certain direction
BeamSource(Point, double, double) - Constructor for class me.kinomoto.proteam.elements.BeamSource
The constructor that is creating the BeamSource with given parameters after rotation
BeamSourceSettingsPanel - Class in me.kinomoto.proteam.settings
JPanel on SettingsPanel where properties of the BeamSource can be modified
BeamSourceSettingsPanel(BeamSource, Surroundings) - Constructor for class me.kinomoto.proteam.settings.BeamSourceSettingsPanel
Create the panel.
begin - Variable in class me.kinomoto.proteam.elements.Segment
 
BLUE - Static variable in class me.kinomoto.proteam.elements.Beam
